channel.title: reidlewis tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from reidlewis.

item.description: @Erdayastronaut @elonmusk Fascinating to see @elonmusk expanding his goals from making life #MultiPlanetary to #MultiStellar which is so very @longnow . . . perhaps that's why the rocket is #SpaceXStarShip instead of #SpaceXPlanetShip Great interview & video, Tim and team!

This came up in a conversation! The #Kardashev scale is a method of measuring a civilization's level of technological advancement based on the amount of energy it is able to use . . . proposed by Soviet astronomer Nikolai Kardashev in 1964. https://t.co/lSFyeITZYS @longnow https://t.co/palSImiyRs

@austinkleon H-E-B Grocery Company, LP is an American privately held supermarket chain based in San Antonio, Texas, with more than 340 stores throughout the U.S. state of Texas, as well as in northeast Mexico.
